steps.body: Get in the habit of checking this view for each assignment, as it lets you do a bunch of important things: edit the assignment, get a link for your Learning Management System, and review how students are doing.

steps.title: Get assignment link
steps.body: Put this assignment directly into your learning management system using this link.

steps.title: Edit this assignment
steps.body: Edit assignment dates or delete an assignment by clicking “edit assignment.”

steps.title: Review Metrics
steps.body: See students’ free-response answers and performance data for each question.
